captions.text: - If guys had menstrual cramps,
we'd be like, oh my God, it hurts so bad,
like all the time to everyone.
Just anyone that'll listen.

- I have three sisters and
a mom and a girlfriend.
And I had a female dog growing up,
so I know what I'm doing.

Red marker is very important
for this next step.
- The red is gonna be my best friend.
- I'm going to use the red pen.
- I hope this isn't too gross.

- Lightning bolts just
attacking your body.

- I feel like any time
a girl describes it,
it's just like, sounds like
your stomach just gets like...
- From what I understand,
cramps feel like a fist
is squeezing your vagina.
- So I drew a penis.
- And it was pretty much like someone ran,
like Olympic style, into the stomach area.
- I imagine it feels like a machine gun is
shooting you from the inside.
And it's just shooting pain bullets.
- I do watch a lot of Gilmore Girls,
so that's very important.

- I don't know why this
guy has a hairy arm,
but he does.
- And of course you can't forget the back.

Let's just do somebody
with a boxing glove,
punching her back.
Just really hard.
- This is what I think
it feels like to have menstrual cramps.

It's a penis, and then
it was ripped in half.
- I feel like this is pretty accurate,

and I feel like the women in
my life can get behind this.
- So I think I was pretty spot on.

I mean, I know that it
can be really grueling.

- Just a big fist
squeezing your lady parts.
- What I was going for here is
kinda like warrior-type thing.

There's like a lot of
(beep) coming at you.
But you're just handling it like a pro.
- Every month.
Satan is definitely involved.

- This is not a great thing
you guys have to go through.
- I think I did all right.

I think people are
going to relate to this.
If like women saw this, they'd be like,
that's exactly what it feels like.
You know my pain.

title: Men Draw What Cramps Feel Like

I laughed a lot through this and loved how right these guys got it!  The

comments.author: sammy

comments.text:
my fellow women complain too much. It's not as bad as girls tell you. You 
feel a bit nautious and it is kinda like someone squeezing you, like the 
one guy drew. The crankiness comes from hormonal changes in the brain, it's 
not due to pain. One time, I was at a lecture and I got a really bad cramp 
and collapsed off the chair... I was at the front and center. XD But that 
was the worst I ever had.﻿
comments.author: Ryuzaki Ryuga

comments.text: ON POINT ﻿

comments.text:
For me, cramps are more like a gradual ache that begins about the second 
day of my period. By the end of the day, the pain has slowly built up and I 
constantly feel like some diarrhea's coming, but there's actually nothing 
there.

Don't even get me started on trying to poop with a tampon in.﻿

comments.author: Shawnagirl783

comments.text:
I get such bad cramps. I've passed out twice the pain was so bad. I can't 
explain in it's normally not in my back but lower abdomen. It come in waves 
and like intensifies with each . Like really bad pressure or someone 
standing and jumping on me. I've thrown up once aswell it makes,e feel 
nauseous. At school like it ur in assembly or class with stools or the 
teacher makes you stand up it's horrific. I just want to curl up on the 
floor and cry in assembly :P I'm not saying guys dk pain but i think they 
have to appreciate it is horrible for some girls so sorry if were a bit 
stressy :/﻿

kind of like your uterus being shredded by a cheese shredder as someone

Guys really underestimate periods like seriously you can barely tell,unless

comments.author: Nataly Flores π

comments.text:
I feel like most of the guys nailed it. The one where it feels like a penis 
getting ripped in half.. I don't know about that because I don't feel like 
I'm getting ripped in half. I think different girls experience cramps 
differently. In my case I feel like there's a tiny little pirate in my 
uterus and he's just swirling a sword in there all around, like my uterus 
and vaginal canal are getting cut up and stabbed from the inside while at 
the same time someone is standing on my lower back putting a lot of 
pressure on it. My breasts also feel like they're stinging and sore as hell 
and like there's bees stinging the inside of them, does anyone else's 
breasts hurt while in they're period? ﻿

comments.author: uetzel

comments.text:
When he ripped the paper I was like YES that's it! And getting punched in

comments.author: Amanda Carson

comments.text: These guys are so smart see all the complaining we do comes in handy! ﻿
comments.author: Abby Banks

comments.text:
fist on the lady parts guy is REAALY close....but not quite the right area. 
it's not on the lady parts, it's inside....think like getting kicked in the 
lower stomach but the foot gets stuck for a few hours while you 
simultaneously gush goop out of your crotch at varying speeds and 
viscosities---but this is only the bottom half symptoms. usually you have 
headaches and uncontrollable moodswings, too. like when my migraines hit, i 
can't open my eyes without feeling like someone is stabbing me in the 
frontal cortex. i get body aches and fatigue. usually i am constantly 
hungry, too. it's just a mess, honestly. but i still have to go to work and 
school--and i work outside in south texas where summers can be 100F 
everyday consecutively...........i hate the menstrual cycle.﻿
comments.author: angel3702

comments.text:
"We would complain all the time"
Why would we, we've shown to never show our feeling before, why then?﻿
